import React from 'react'; const Contact = ({ isVisible }) => { return (

Get In Touch

Interested in working together or have an opportunity to discuss? You can reach me via email or connect with me on LinkedIn.

Email

sfarrukhm@gmail.com

LinkedIn

linkedin.com/in/sfarrukhm

); }; export default Contact;
